S B I U S BL NL To use above buttons, select the text and tap on button. It uses markdown, you will see the output on Notes view. 

 Markdown Guide: 

**Bold**, _Italic_, ~~Strikethrough~~, `Code`, [Link Text](URL) 

 For more markdown syntax visit https://spec.commonmark.org/0.28/
